meanings.definition: To add moisture back to something.
meanings.sent1: The chef remoistened the leftover pasta with a splash of sauce.
meanings.sent2: She remoistened her hair with a few drops of conditioner.
meanings.sent3: He quickly remoistened the towel before drying his hands.
meanings.sent4: The humid air naturally remoistened the dry skin.
meanings.sent5: They remoistened the paintbrush to continue painting the wall.
